description:
AMC has reportedly picked up The Night Manager, a miniseries starring Tom Hiddleston and Hugh Laurie. 美国AMC电视台宣布将会预订《夜班经理》，这是一部由Tom Hiddleston和Hugh Laurie主演的美剧。

AMC has given the adaptation of John le Carré’s 1993 novel of the same name a straight-to-series order. The network will co-produce along with BBC One and Ink Factory, according to THR, whose sources say that AMC is “looking at the project as a six- or eight-part miniseries.” Hiddleston is set to play former British soldier Jonathan Pine, now a hotel night auditor, who is pitted against Laurie’s Richard Onslow Roper, a black market dealer.AMC这部电视剧将会改编1993年John le Carré’s的同名小说。AMC将会和BBC 1台和Ink Factory共同开发这部剧。THR报道，AMC电视台想把这部迷你剧分作6-8集播出。Hiddleston将会在剧中扮演英国退役军人Jonathan Pine，现在在酒店当夜审员。他和Laurie扮演的黑市买手Richard Onslow Roper有过节。

The show will mark Laurie’s return to TV following his run on House. Though Hiddleston is probably best known for playing Marvel’s villainous Loki.这部剧是Laurie出演《豪斯医生》后的再次回归电视圈。而Hiddleston则是因为扮演漫威反派Loki而被观众们所熟悉。

title: 抖森来混美剧圈 参演《夜班经理》

description:
Downton Abbey finished its fifth season on British network ITV Sunday night with an average of more than 8 million viewers, its lowest-ever U.K. audience for a season finale to-date.《唐顿庄园》在英国ITV周日晚迎来了第五季结局集，这集收看人数为800万，成为开播以来收视最低的结局集。

The overnight ratings showed the drama's audience was down from past season finales. That was the season's second-highest overnight rating behind the season opener.整晚的收视率比上一季结局集要低。不过单季来看，这已经是全季第二高的收视成绩了，最高的是第四季的开播集。

The second-season finale averaged 10.5 million viewers in the overnight data, and the first season finale had drawn 10.1 million in the overnights.第二季结局集的收视成绩是1050万收视人数，而第一季的收视成绩是1010万人数。
